Detailed Description

MIR specific tree node to represent a string or floating point iteral. We use this in the middle/back ends as these particular types of data are not capable of being stored in normal GP registers, while FP literals can be in the FP registers, they have to go through memory to get there.

Children:
   0. Literal being referred to.
